entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Drizzle over southern sections early this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023
